Description: On I-66 at mile marker 64 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The east right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 160.2 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.

Description: On US-29 in the County of Nelson, in the vicinity of Lewis Ln; Rt. 775E/W (Nelson County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All north lanes are closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 153 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
